answers.answer: You can tell if it's a boy by 13/14 weeks , the boys body part is pretty well there lol . I know at 12 weeks with both my boys . One was by blood work tho . And I paid for a 3D/4D ultrasound at 14 weeks and he wasn't afraid to show he was a boy lol . Neither of my boys was afraid show they was boys !!
That's what I was thinking. If I post a picture could you be able to compare haha?
Omg i was gunna ask the same thing .. ill be 14weeks .. i should be able to find out ?
You'll be able to know for sure at 16 weeks

question: I am getting monitored every two weeks for preeclampsia. I have ultrasounds regularly on my heart and baby. Today I am nearly 14 weeks and my technician said let's see if bubs legs are open. We had a look and they were very much wife open, she said she can't be 99% sure but she thinks it will be a boy. It was very prominent and we seen there was something sticking up, but a lady told me the two dots at the bottom mean ovaries.I though the ovaries had entered the body by 10-12 weeks? Am I wrong??? I'm not getting my hopes up I just want bub to be healthy.
title: Gender at 13 weeks?
